channel.title: Need teleport command(problem still not solved) please explain in detail!
channel.description:
I need a teleport command so when u do ::mine it takes u to these coords: 3142, 9870.
So thanks if u help me

item.title: Need teleport command(problem still not solved) please explain in detail!
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“hitman2009, post:31, topic:303005”]if ur doing delta do this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mine")){//mine command for nubz toX = 3142; toY = 9871; sM("You have teleported to the mine."); } [/quote]Why do you guys add comments?

item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

Use my command:

        } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mine")) {
            if (teleblock == true) {
                sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar
            } else {
                teleportToX = 3142;
                teleportToY = 9870;
                sendMessage("You teleport to Mine.");
            }

Hope it works, if it does can you consider giving me some rep++? You wont need to but i cant give rep till i get it past 10 lol so im working on it.
